content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ New names for the Search app and XDR Threat Investigation August 4, 2025—To align with the expanding scope of XDR capabilities, the Search app has been renamed to XDR Data Explorer and XDR Threat Investigation app group has been renamed to Agentic SIEM & XDR. For more information, see XDR Data Explorer. Agentic SIEM & XDR → XDR Data Explorer © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: New names for the Search app and XDR Threat Investigation
